name: Brookfield Infrastructure Partners L.P.
description: Brookfield Infrastructure Partners L.P. is a leading global infrastructure investment firm that focuses on owning and operating high-quality infrastructure assets across the world. Founded in 2008, the firm is part of Brookfield Asset Management, a global alternative asset manager with a focus on real estate, renewable power, infrastructure, and private equity. Brookfield Infrastructure has a diverse portfolio that includes utilities, transport, energy, and data infrastructure, providing critical services to millions of people. The company is known for its disciplined investment approach, leveraging its deep operational expertise and extensive industry relationships to enhance the value of its assets. With a commitment to sustainability, Brookfield Infrastructure actively invests in renewable energy projects and strives to reduce the carbon footprint of its operations. The firm aims to deliver strong risk-adjusted returns to its unitholders while contributing to the development of essential infrastructure that supports economic growth and improves quality of life globally.
